title.rendered: UPDATING THE PROGRESS OF WÍNK SAIGON CENTER HOTEL PROJECT

content.rendered:
Wínk Hotel is located in one of the most developing areas in District 1 –  the economic and financial center of Ho Chi Minh City. The hotel is owned a new modern design, simulating the typical characteristics of the Wínk brand: modern, minimalist, effective on the basis of cultural values and Vietnamese traditions.

Commenced on April 11, 2019, Newtecons was trusted by the Investor to take on the role of General Contractor. This is also a solid premise for the cooperation between the two parties in the future.

Read more: Newtecons sucessfully organized the the topping out ceremony of Wínk Saigon Center Hotel project
